puzzle: Brrr… poor Cooki thought cold was clever,
Hiding where frost lasts forever.
Doors hum softly, shelves gleam white,
She shook with fear all through the night.
taunt: Nice try, elf — I knew you'd freeze!
hint: Look where milk, juice, and ice live

puzzle: Words can’t save him, stories won’t hide,
Cooki thought tales were a perfect disguise.
Between the lines where heroes sleep,
Another clue waits — if you read deep.
taunt: Honestly, elf… did you even try?

puzzle: She dreamed of escape, oh what a plan!
Past coats and shoes — run while you can!
In and out is where feet roam free,
But Cooki won’t be leaving — not from me.
Soft as clouds and low to the ground,
Cooki hid where bottoms are found.
Pillows whispered, cushions lied,
Lift them up — the truth’s inside.
taunt: You’re warmer than Cooki ever was!
hint: Check under or between couch cushions

puzzle: Tick… tock… time betrays,
Every second gives Cooki away.
Where hands spin circles, never stop,
The next clue waits — right on the dot.
Socks and shirts all neatly stacked,
Cooki thought clothes had his back.
Drawers don’t lie, doors don’t scheme,
His hiding spot wasn’t very keen.
Outside she ran, so bold and fast,
Thinking fresh air would help her last.
Metal waits where flames are fed,
Where food is cooked and lids are spread.
hint: Check the grill in the backyard

puzzle: Light reveals what darkness keeps,
Cooki ran where shadow sleeps.
A switch, a glow, a sudden shine,
The next clue waits below the line.
Higher still — his bravest climb,
Cooki thought she'd run out my time.
Boxes watch from lofty space,
Look up now — you're near his place.
This is the place where mischief began,
Cooki whispered her sneaky plan.
Not for cars, but tools and more,
Look for a door up off the floor.
Above this room her fate is sealed,
The trapped elf waits — completely revealed.
taunt: You planned it here, Cooki… and here you fell.
hint: Go to the attic door inside the garage
